entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Swan River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swan River 07:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -26.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -30.1°C
Wind: SW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
